definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
person suffering exploitation/the workers in Marxist theory

sentences.english: Why orb spiders are successful receiver exploiters ?
sentences.chinese: 为何结网性蜘蛛为成功的受讯方剥削者？

sentences.english: He always sided with the oppressed and the exploited.
sentences.chinese: 他总是站在被压迫和被剥削者一边。

sentences.english: The exploiters have been smashed, but not destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 剥削者已经受到重击，但没有被消灭。

sentences.english: This precise behavior, makes you think he is exploitative and conniving.
sentences.chinese: 那些精明的行为让你觉得他是个老谋深算的剥削者。

sentences.english: After an explosion the explorer restored the storage of the explosive in the exploiters storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸过后勘探者恢复了剥削者的仓库里炸药的储量。

sentences.english: He denounced all landlords and money-lenders as evil predators.
sentences.chinese: 放债者都是罪恶的剥削者。

sentences.english: The exploiter soiled the boiling oil in the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 剥削者在盥洗室里弄脏了沸腾的油。

sentences.english: After an explosion the explorer restored the storage of the explosive in the exploiter' s storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸过后勘探者恢复了剥削者的仓库里炸药的储量。
